sent.orig: If petrol is what is wanted, petrol is what will be delivered.
sent.trans: 汽油因有需求而被供应，柴油也不例外。

sent.orig: The petrol offered for sale to motorists is a blend of straight distilled petrol.
sent.trans: 卖给汽车驾驶者的汽油是纯蒸馏汽油的混成品。

sent.orig: When refuelling petrol-engined units petrol does not spill onto hot surfaces.
sent.trans: 当加油汽油装有引擎的单位汽油不溢出热表面。

sent.orig: We' d better first fill the car up with petrol at the petrol station.
sent.trans: 我们最好先到加油站去给汽车加满汽油。

sent.orig: The price of petrol is coming down/Petrol is coming down in price.
